subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan had a goal and an assist in the Galaxy’s 3-1 mauling of the Red Bulls at Giants Stadium, though it was David Beckham who drew a bigger crowd reaction.
snippet: Landon Donovan had a goal and an assist in the Galaxy’s 3-1 mauling of the Red Bulls at Giants Stadium, though it was David Beckham who drew a bigger crowd reaction.
